text.value: 17. Date when your team received information on sick/dead birds (dd-mm-yyyy)
23. What is the name of rapid test used?
16. Were there any sick/dead birds found?
14. Did the investigators conduct a meeting to build network or to raise community awareness on avian influenza?
22. Number of sick/dead birds tested by the rapid test (number)
28. What type of culling was performed? (check one)
Focal culling ( culling of all birds in affected flock)
Has a farm assessment been conducted previously?
11. Phone number of the contact person
19. In what type of production system did the cases occur? (check one)
15. Did the investigators search for sick/dead birds?
25. VTM samples collected and sent to the lab? (check one)
13. Were the investigators called out to the community to investigate sick/dead birds?
Presence of lice on the skin
Clusters of eggs/feces glued to the feather

input.hint: GPS coordinates can only be collected when outside.
